description.en: That key you found in the barrel truck... I won't jump to accusations just yet, but this reeks of an inside job. Could you investigate a hunch I have?

objectives.en: Reach the southwest lobby of the Departure Building
Search the room for any clues of the saboteur's identity
Reach the tunnels below the Spaceport
Use the key on any Flushing Terminal to override the bypass protocol
